The ideal answer is an extraction of all instances of MRIWA/MERIWA in the reports above.
mriwa_meriwa_instances.csv contains all identified terms.

B1 = All MRIWA report IDs extracted WITH all instances/quotations of MERIWA/MRIWA from the report itself.
B2 = Some MRIWA report IDs extracted WITH an instance/quotation of MERIWA/MRIWA from the report itself.
B3 = Discussing MRIWA/MERIWA in MRIWA's reports generally, or identifying some MRIWA report IDs but no extraction of an instance/quotation of MERIWA/MRIWA.
B4 = Discussions not about or not related to MRIWA/MERIWA in MRIWA's reports (e.g., MRIWA appearing in reports other than MRIWA's reports).
B5 = False statement.
